item.title: Radiant Village
item.content:encoded:
Are you tired of having that high tax on your mission earnings? Have you considered goin rogue, but it's too complicated to return to your village to blow all your money on the Party House? Then the Radiant Village, the Village Hidden on the Emblem, has the solution for you! With it's really low taxes you can grind your ryo and blow them at the Party House at the same time! All we ask of you is to collect every day, and donate some contracts every once a week. Our really low taxes are worth it! How low do you think they are? 35%? 25%? 20%? No, it's an astonishing 1%!!! Yes, 1%!!! So what are your waiting for? You don't have to stay permanently, just a couple of days until you're done with your grinding. Join the Radiant Village now!
